issue.title: Issue when attempting to scale model

content.raw:
This is probably true and has not worked before. If I recall correctly, we added `<scale>` to model to support scaling through the UI client but we don't actually read that sdf value when spawning models in the  world.

As a workaround, you'll need to specify the exact size of your geometry (or scale if it's a mesh geom) in your collision and visual element.
